title: Finding the Inverse Matrix
text: We must find the inverse of the matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} 8 & 4 \\ 3 & -4 \end{bmatrix}$$, which is $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{11} & \frac{1}{11} \\ \frac{3}{44} & \frac{-2}{11} \end{bmatrix}$$
speech: We must find the inverse of the matrix  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 8, 4 row 2 3, negative 4 , which is  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 column 1 1 over 11 column 2 1 over 11 row 2 column 1 3 over 44 column 2 fraction, negative 2, over 11,
pacedSpeech: We must find the inverse of the matrix   the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 8, 4 row 2 3, negative 4

title: Multiplying the constant matrix and the coefficient matrix.
text: We must now multiply the matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} -100 \\ 1 \end{bmatrix}$$ by $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{11} & \frac{1}{11} \\ \frac{3}{44} & \frac{-2}{11} \end{bmatrix}$$, giving us $$\begin{bmatrix} -9 \\ -7 \end{bmatrix}$$. This means that our answer is $$(-9,-7)$$
